version_description:
* Added online store access to start-up message.
* Added 64-bit integration (bumped min. iOS version to 5.1.1).

* Added online store access to start-up message.
* Added 64-bit integration (bumped min. iOS version to 5.1.1).

* Added new Wifi Channel Guide - SES Custom
* Removed sounds from the app.

* Added new Wifi Channel Guide - SES Custom
* Removed sounds from the app.
Changed the starting channel for the SES Custom channel guide to channel 0.
Changed the starting channel for the SES Custom channel guide to channel 0.
Minor bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes.
Added button "Rename" to allow renaming of files in the data log manager (Settings->Manage Data Log).
Added button "Rename" to allow renaming of files in the data log manager (Settings->Manage Data Log).

Added support for new hardware WiPry 5x.
Completely redesigned the backend of the app.
NOTE: Due to the redesign of the app backend, the following features are currently missing in this release. They are in the process of being added and will be available in the next release.
* SSID Utilization Table
* Wifi Channel Guide
* Data logging
* Screenshot/email

Added support for new hardware WiPry 5x.
Completely redesigned the backend of the app.
NOTE: Due to the redesign of the app backend, the following features are currently missing in this release. They are in the process of being added and will be available in the next release.
* SSID Utilization Table
* Wifi Channel Guide
* Data logging
* Screenshot/email

Added Access Point Utilization.
Fixed minor bugs.
NOTE: Due to the redesign of the app backend, the following features are currently missing in this release. They are in the process of being added and will be available in the next release.
* Wifi Channel Guide
* Data logging
* Screenshot/email

Added Access Point Utilization.
Fixed minor bugs.
NOTE: Due to the redesign of the app backend, the following features are currently missing in this release. They are in the process of being added and will be available in the next release.
* Wifi Channel Guide
* Data logging
* Screenshot/email

Added 2.4 GHz Wifi channel guide.
Fixed spectrum heat map display to look better.
NOTE: Due to the redesign of the app backend, the following features are currently missing in this release. They are in the process of being added and will be available in the next release.
* Data logging
* Screenshot/email

Added 2.4 GHz Wifi channel guide.
Fixed spectrum heat map display to look better.
NOTE: Due to the redesign of the app backend, the following features are currently missing in this release. They are in the process of being added and will be available in the next release.
* Data logging
* Screenshot/email

Added 5 GHz channel guide.
Added Data Logging (Power Mode & Spectrum 2.4GHz and 5 GHz rssi).
Added screenshots (screenshots will be saved in the same folder as the data logs instead of the normal iOS Photo).
Added "Manage files" button in settings menu to email screenshots and files.
Fixed incorrect positioning of 5 GHz SSIDs.

Added 5 GHz channel guide.
Added Data Logging (Power Mode & Spectrum 2.4GHz and 5 GHz rssi).
Added screenshots (screenshots will be saved in the same folder as the data logs instead of the normal iOS Photo).
Added "Manage files" button in settings menu to email screenshots and files.
Fixed incorrect positioning of 5 GHz SSIDs.
Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes

Fixed bug where RSSI data would sometimes not stream when WiPry 5x is connected.
Fixed bug where invalid access points are shown on screen.
Fixed bug where the SSID refresh button and 5.4 Ghz button remained enabled when older accessory (which do not support these features) are connected.
Changed SSID refresh range from 10s - 60s to 30s - 120s.

Fixed bug where RSSI data would sometimes not stream when WiPry 5x is connected.
Fixed bug where invalid access points are shown on screen.
Fixed bug where the SSID refresh button and 5.4 Ghz button remained enabled when older accessory (which do not support these features) are connected.
Changed SSID refresh range from 10s - 60s to 30s - 120s.
Fixed accessory communication bug.
Fixed accessory communication bug.
Bug Fixes.

* Fixed weird looking scroll bars on some of the menus.
* Changed the app to initially request SSID’s instead of spectrum rssi values when WiPry 5x is connected.
* Fixed incorrect units for the delta cursor labels. Units were changed from “dBm” instead of “dB”
* Fixed other miscellaneous bugs.
Bug Fixes.

* Fixed weird looking scroll bars on some of the menus.
* Changed the app to initially request SSID’s instead of spectrum rssi values when WiPry 5x is connected.
* Fixed incorrect units for the delta cursor labels. Units were changed from “dBm” instead of “dB”
* Fixed other miscellaneous bugs.

* Change Pickerview UI to be a bit more easy to use.
* Changed the demo SSIDs of WiPry5x.
* SSIDs are requested immediately after the device is connected and making certain changes.
* Fixed bug where setting SSID refresh rate to "Always" sometimes does not request SSID.
* Changed the color of the real wave options (Raw, Decay, etc) in the menu to match it's actual color on the display.
* Other minor UI changes.
* Other bug fixes.

* Change Pickerview UI to be a bit more easy to use.
* Changed the demo SSIDs of WiPry5x.
* SSIDs are requested immediately after the device is connected and making certain changes.
* Fixed bug where setting SSID refresh rate to "Always" sometimes does not request SSID.
* Changed the color of the real wave options (Raw, Decay, etc) in the menu to match it's actual color on the display.
* Other minor UI changes.
* Other bug fixes.

*Added support for WiPry 2500x.
*Replaced data logging with new play back and record.
*Fixed bugs.

*Added support for WiPry 2500x.
*Replaced data logging with new play back and record.

* Added support for WiPry Sub 1 GHz accessories (WiPry 340x and WiPry 790x).

* Added support for WiPry Sub 1 GHz accessories (WiPry 340x and WiPry 790x).
* Bug fixes.
Bug fixes for new WiPry 2500x hardware release.
Bug fixes for new WiPry 2500x hardware release.

Added support to detect 802.11ax access points on 2.4 and 5 GHz.
Bug fixes for WiPry 2500x.

Added support to detect 802.11ax access points on 2.4 and 5 GHz.
Bug fixes for WiPry 2500x.
Bug fixes and UI enhancements.
Bug fixes and UI enhancements.

Oscium is introducing two new spectrum analyzers!!

WiPry 340x - Covering frequency ranges 300-348MHz and 387-464MHz
WiPry 790x - Covering the following frequency ranges:
USA (902-928MHz)
China (755-787MHz)
Europe (863-868MHz)
Japan (916-928MHz)
Korea (917-924MHz)
Singapore (866-925MHz)

Additional changes:
Added back CSV data logging found in settings menu.
Numerous other bug fixes!
